State Rep: Jim Steineke claimed that Gov. Tony Evers has refused to meet with Republican leaders.
Gov: Tony Evers mentioned in a news conference that he is willing to meet with Republican leaders as often as necessary and emphasized the importance of good conversations and involving staff members in those discussions.
Assembly Speaker Robin Vos stated that G: Scott Walker used to meet with legislative leaders on a regular basis, but Evers seems only interested in talking every few months.
